title: Laughter, Life Lessons and Logic from the Culinary Catwalk Diva Queen of the Waitress World
description: Laughter, Life Lessons and Logic from the Culinary Catwalk Diva Queen of the Waitress World is nothing but non-stop hilarity from beginning to end. This book entails the insane experiences of my time working in restaurants and waiting tables. It also gives tips on the best times to go eat, the top 10 Deal Breaker dishes NOT to eat, and tips on starting up your own restaurant. There is something to offer for everyone who reads it. http://t.co/mmLN1jTs1I
author: Tammy Darnell
